title: A nonperturbative regularization of the supersymmetric Schwinger model
abstract: It is shown that noncommutative geometry is a nonperturbative regulator which can manifestly preserve a space supersymmetry and a supergauge symmetry while keeping only a finite number of degrees of freedom in a theory. The simplest N=1 case of an U(1) supergauge theory on the sphere is worked out in detail.
